body_html:
I found the cause.
I was not using mnist.train.next_batch() correctly. I was assuming it was thread safe.

More details here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45574025/random-crashes-when-training-with-multiple-threads-on-tensorflow/45594648#45594648

I'll close this issue.

body:
I found the cause. 
I was not using `mnist.train.next_batch()` correctly. I was assuming it was thread safe.

More details here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/45574025/random-crashes-when-training-with-multiple-threads-on-tensorflow/45594648#45594648

I'll close this issue.
